title: Ralph Nader
content:
Conversations with Remarkable Minds The Potential for a Left-Right Alliance to challenge the Duopoly in... <!--more--> Washington Ralph Nader is one of the most influential Americans of the past several decades.
  He is directly responsible for many of our most important bills that have provided protection to consumers against the onslaughts of corporate short-term profits and the Friedmanite free market, unregulated capitalism.
landmark acts for Freedom of Information, Clean Water, Clean Air, Whistleblower Protection, Wholesome Food, and others that have been enacted by Congress and implemented.
  A graduate of Princeton and Harvard universities, Ralph has been a presidential candidate for five elections, building his platform on consumer rights, humanitarian and civil rights efforts, environmental sanity, and democratic government.
Ralph’s most recent book “Unstoppable: The Emerging Left-Right Alliance to Dismantle the Corporate State” that outlines a new progressive path for a sustainable future and to take control back from the Corporate regime in Washington.  His website is Nader.org
